price: Basi hukumu baina yangu na wao kwa hukumu yako, na uniokoe mimi na walio pamoja nami, Waumini.
arabic: فَٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: Basi tuhukumie baina yangu na wao, kwa hukumu ya kuwaangamiza wanao pinga Upweke wako, na wakamkadhibisha Mtume wako! Na niokoe mimi na Waumini walio pamoja nami na adhabu ya uasi wao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-if'taḥ baynī wabaynahum fatḥan wanajjinī waman maʿiya mina al-mu'minīna
